show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The World Has Lost Control Of Its Finances

title: The World Has Lost Control Of Its Finances
content:
The world economy is just as vulnerable to a financial crisis as it was in 2007 except that debt ratios are far higherâ€¦ and emerging markets are also involved.
Asia is now grotesquely over-indebted as well.
China is a debt-ridden monster capable of collapsing and bringing the world economy to its knees.
Warren Harding is a much-maligned President.
He was actually a great President.
His policies introduced the Roaring Twenties, a time of economic growth.
Why the official unemployment rate is so low.
The menace of Ponzi finance.
Stock market report.
